message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY

This paper discusses the use of momentum in stochastic gradient methods, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also analyzes the convergence conditions and stability regions of different algorithms, which falls under numerical analysis (cs.NA). The practical guidelines for setting the learning rate and momentum parameters involve optimizing performance measures, which is a topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the success of momentum on various tasks, including computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the analysis of stability regions and stationary distributions relates to control systems (cs.SY).
